messages.subject: Beads and Milwaukee
messages.msgSnippet: Hello to any and all lovely unchoolers in the Milwaukee area! We are going to be in the area the first week of June for the Bead and Button show. We found an
messages.messageBody:
Hello to any and all lovely unchoolers in the Milwaukee area!

We are going to be in the area the first week of June for the Bead and
Button show. We found an amazing deal for a hotel ($40 downtown at a 3
1/2 star!) but the parking price is crazy. We have an extra ticket
into the show and were wondering if anyone would like to trade an out
of town free parking spot and the ride to and from for the free
ticket, some free beads and some unschooling fun involving beads,
jewelry and the business thereof (if desired). We love talking about
and showing off our beads.

Sadly our kids opted to stay home. They are sufficiently bored of long
days at bead shows.

Thanks so much if you can help!

Jean Elizabeth and Esther

http://3mommies.blogspot.com
